description: Update references a non-existent event that is not on the calendar. Should fall back to create.

events.title: Architecture Review
events.reasoning: Alice initially asked to move an architecture review, but no matching event was found on the calendar. The conversation resolved to simply creating a new event for Wednesday at 3 PM.
events.assumptions: No existing architecture review found, creating new event

mock_llm_response.summary: Created new architecture review for Wednesday at 3 PM (no existing event to update).

notes: Reference datetime is Monday 2026-02-16, so 'Wednesday' resolves to 2026-02-18. Calendar has no architecture review to match, so the LLM should fall back to create.
